snippet.title: Artificer's Tower: Your Mage Colony Awaits - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Artificer's Tower presents an enchanting blend of resource management, colony sim, and tower defense, all set in a mystical realm of magic and adventure. Get a glimpse of the spellbinding world in this official trailer. Wishlist Artificer's Tower on Steam today!

Become a master of the magical arts in Artificer's Tower. Build your mage tower however you see fit. Add rooms for learning, create traps, enchant weapons, manage your mages, and fend off formidable foes.

From RodentGames, an indie developer passionate about creating unique and immersive gaming experiences. Artificer's Tower is set to release next year.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/45ZpWlt

Subscribe to our channel for more updates about Artificer's Tower and future projects from RodentGames.
